biotools.summary: A procedure that uses target-decoy competition (or knockoffs) to reject multiple hypotheses in the presence of group structure. The procedure controls the false discovery rate (FDR) at a user-specified threshold.

bioschemas.name: Group-walk
bioschemas.summary: A procedure that uses target-decoy competition (or knockoffs) to reject multiple hypotheses in the presence of group structure. The procedure controls the false discovery rate (FDR) at a user-specified threshold.
